title: Surface hydroxyl group dominating aerobic oxidation of methane below room temperature
content:

Baiyang Yu, Lu Cheng, Jiaju Wu, Bing Yang, Hong Li, Jing Xu, Ying Zhang, Chengsi Pan, Xiao-Ming Cao, Yongfa Zhu, Yang Lou
Titanium silicate-supported single Pd atoms coated with ultrathin N-doped carbon (Pd1/TS-1@CN) as an efficient and stable catalyst enabling direct oxidation of methane to value-added products with 100% selectivity by O2 and H2 at 15 Â°C.
